content.rendered:
• We offer Liquid Thixotropic Pumping Aids suitable for all types of Concrete
  • Supplied in Liquid Form for Easy Dispensing
  • Reduces Segregation and Bleeding
  • Substantially Reduces Pump Pressures allowing Faster Pumping
  • Reduces Wear & Tear on Equipment
  • Assists in Pumping of Lean Concrete Mixes
  • Controls Workability Changes due to Aggregate Variations

Uses

  • Pumping and spraying of Premix GRC
  • Pumpaid for concrete and mortar

Advantages

  • Reduced segregation and bleeding
  • Supplied in liquid form for easy dispensing
  • Substantially reduced pump pressures allowing faster pumping
  • Reduces wear and tear on equipment
  • Assists in pumping of lean concrete mixes
  • Enables the pumping of concrete containing harsh or porous lightweight concrete

Method of Use

  • Dispense with mix water

Dosage

  • 0.1 – 1.0% by weight of cement – Confirm after trials

Storage and Shelf Life

  • Minimum 1 year in sealed containers stored in dry warehouse conditions
    (5 –30°C)

 

Download the Pumpaid FT Brochure
